entry.title: 5/17 - Combined Talents 2019 Annual Juried Competition
entry.content:
Florida State University Museum of Fine Arts
üìç Tallahassee, FL, United States
üé® All Visual Arts
üìÖ 05/17/2019 deadline
üí∞ $20.00 fee
‚û° Apply


====== DESCRIPTION ======

"Combined Talents" is an annual juried competition sponsored by the Florida State University Museum of Fine Arts (MoFA). The competition is open to artists within the United States, eighteen years of age or older, with all subject matter and media eligible for consideration. The entry fee is $20 for two works. Deadline to enter is May 17, 2019. Hallie Ringle, the Hugh Kaul Curator of Contemporary Art at the Birmingham Museum of Art (BMA) will be the juror for the competition. First prize is $1,000 and second prize is $500. The exhibition is scheduled for August 16 to September 29, 2019.


===== INSTRUCTIONS =====

For a complete prospectus, with link to the online entry form, please visit our website:
http://mofa.fsu.edu/participate/tallahassee-international/

entry.title: 5/19 - FJORD Gallery 6th Annual Open Call
entry.content:
FJORD Gallery
üìç Philadelphia, PA, United States
üé® All Visual Arts
üìÖ 05/19/2019 deadline
üí∞ $20.00 fee
‚û° Apply


====== DESCRIPTION ======

FJORD Gallery is pleased to announce our 2019 Open Call!
Artists are invited to submit their work for consideration in this group exhibition, to run July 6 ‚Äì August 1, 2019. Applicants will be notified of acceptance by approximately two weeks after the submission deadline

Artwork must be delivered to gallery by June 29th and be install-ready.

Artists working in all mediums are encouraged to apply. The exhibition will be curated by Fjord members; there is no specified theme. Artists outside of Philadelphia are encouraged to apply, but will be responsible for shipping or delivering their work to and from the gallery. Please visit our website to see our previous juried exhibitions. This is an opportunity for us to learn about your work and to hopefully establish future relationships. We look forward to reviewing your work!

Deadline to apply: May 19, 11:59pm
Exhibition to run: July 6 ‚Äì August 1
Opening Reception: Thursday, July 11 6-9pm


===== INSTRUCTIONS =====

Submission Guidelines:
-‚ÄãPlease submit a single multi-page PDF of your work, image list, CV and statement to fjord.submissions@gmail.com.
-Name your PDF using the following format: LastName_FirstName_2019OpenCall.pdf
-Files should be no larger than 10mb

Submissions should include:
-Up to 5 images or 3 videos (additional detail shots of 3d work or video stills may also be included)
-If submitting video, please include Vimeo links
-Image list; please include title, year, dimensions, and media
-One page CV
-Artist Statement (250 word max.)

Submission fee is $20, payable through Paypal. Please submit payment to fjord.curator@gmail.com.

entry.title: 5/25 - Open Call for Artists - "Patterns of Influence"
entry.content:
The Painting Center
üìç New York, NY, United States
üé® All Visual Arts
üìÖ 05/25/2019 deadline
üí∞ $40.00 fee
‚û° Apply


====== DESCRIPTION ======

How does your artistic practice inform your teaching practice? How does observing and nurturing your student‚Äôs artistic growth and development impact your own art? Artist/Educators are invited to submit to a juried exhibition highlighting their work at The Painting Center, an artist run, non-profit art gallery in the heart of Chelsea, NYC. Patterns of Influence will be highly publicized with a catalogue featuring the artists' images and personal statements addressing the interrelationship of their artistic and teaching practices. The Painting Center is interested in work in all media (under 36‚Äù in any direction) by artist/educators for this juried exhibition. This exhibition is curated by Andrea Kantrowitz, Sue Collier and Barbara Laube.

This exhibition is open to all media.
Exhibition Dates: July 16 ‚Äì August 10, 2019
Deadline for Submission: May 25, 2019
Notification Date: June 1, 2019
Opening Reception: Thursday, July 18, 6 - 8 pm
Artists and Educators Public Forum: Saturday, July 27, 2019
Application Fee: $40 for 1 to 5 images.
Size Limitation: Artwork that exceeds 36" in any dimension will not be considered.


===== INSTRUCTIONS =====

To Apply Visit:

https://thepaintingcenter.slideroom.com/#/login/program/47763
